handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 当用户将鼠标指针移到错误标志符号时，工具提示中将显示错误文本。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用的单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件时使用的大量数据，以避免设置单元格的性能损失多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells.
